page.title: 11A MEMBER OF THE COMMUNITY
page.content: MR.ALEX MCPHERSON(32) IS AN ACTIVE MEMBER OF THE COMMUNITY.HE LIVES IN BISHOPTON,WHICH IS ABOUT 12 MILES FROM GREENOCK.HE WORKS IN GOUROCK HIGH SCHOOL DEAF UNIT TEACHING DEAF CHILDREN.HE IS A REGISTERED INTERPRETER FOR THE DEAF AND IS ALSO AN ACCOMPLISHED ARTIST. IN HIS WORK AND OUTSIDE INTRESTS HE TRAVELS ABOUT 70 TO 80 MILES A DAY. HE TEACHES FROM 8.30AM TO 5.30PM AND PAINTS FROM 7PM TO 9PM. HE INTERPRETS IN MANY SCHOOL SUBJECTS AND AT MEETINGS. HE PAINTS PORTRAITS AND POSTERS. HE ENJOYS SIGNING FOR THE DEAF AND MEETING NEW PEOPLE. MR.MCPHERSON IS A MEMBER OF MANY SOCIETIES CONNECTED WITH HIS JOB. HIS OTHER INTERESTS INCLUDE COOKING,HORSE RIDING,THE CINEMA AND LISTENING TO MUSIC.
